title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 4 ) Order, 2021
content:
17th December, 2021 Statutory Instruments 681
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 88 OF 2021
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Laws, Volume 35, Cap. 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government
By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
(No. 4 ) Order, 2021
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No.
4 ) Order, 2021.
2. A candidate for election as a councillor in a district and ward Date and time
set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the Returning of nomination
for election
Officer on Tuesday, 28th December, 2021, between 0900 hours
and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Tuesday, 28th Campaign
December, 2021, at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on period
Wednesday, 19th January, 2022.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a councillor in a district Election date
and ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday, and time of
poll
20th January, 2022, between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district and ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K 4.00 each.
